'''Wendy''' is a co-worker of [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]]'s that appeared in the episode "[[The One with Christmas in Tulsa]]" in [[Season 9]]. She is portrayed by [[Selma Blair]].

==Personality==
She openly states to Chandler that she was attracted to him even though she was married. She was even willing to have sex with him, though Chandler rejected all her advances and decided to quit his job to stay with Monica. She is quite daring as when she saw how much fun the insurance people of their company were having when she and her sector had to work, she stole their Christmas ham just to annoy them.

==Occupation==
She is mentioned to be the regional vice-president of the Oklahoma branch of the company that Chandler works for.

==History==
She is mentioned by [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] to have been the runner-up for the Miss Oklahoma beauty contest.
